metadata.title: CVE-2014-9033 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in wp-login.php inWordPress 3.7.4, 3.8.4, 3.9.2, and 4.0 allows remote attackers to hijackthe authentication of arbitrary users for requests that reset passwords.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
